name: Iowa511
0:
”Alexa open Iowa five one one”
”Alexa, ask Iowa five one one what is happening in Des Moines”
”Alexa, ask Iowa five one one for closures between Mason City and Cedar Rapids”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: iowa five one one
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get real-time traffic information across Iowa – brought to you by the Iowa DOT. Iowa 511 delivers critical information on major incidents, road closures, extreme winter road conditions, major construction projects, and more for Interstates, US routes, and state highways – not city or county roads. Events on highway ramps are also not included.

For more comprehensive traffic details, including minor events and lower-impact updates, visit the Iowa DOT’s 511 website at www.511ia.org or download the Iowa 511 mobile app
https://511ia.org/help/section/IA_511_app.html

 Whether you're commuting or planning a road trip, you can ask for traffic updates in various ways:
 
- By City: "What's happening in Des Moines"
- By Route: "Tell me about traffic on I-80 eastbound."
- Between Cities: "Are there closures between Mason City and Cedar Rapids"
- By County: "What's the traffic situation in Linn County?"

Note: Traffic updates provided by this skill cover Interstates, US routes, and state highways only - not city or county roads. Events on ramps are also not included.

Tip: You can interrupt Alexa at any time by saying the wake word, like "Alexa", to ask a new question, provide information, or stop the current response.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
